item.description:
@curlingrock0 wrote:

Hey im new to whriting on moparscape but not READING
i am haveing probs with my food command it only gives 2 sea turtels not 999999… and soo on… my coad is

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“food”)&& playerRights >= 2){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“food”)){ //Voule Command Generator
pEmote = 0439;
addItem(0397,99999999);
sendMessage(“You have Food!!”);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has used Food Command ";
}
[/code]
please help
